location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Map of Muharraq Island showing the present and proposed sites of landing ground

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Photographic print on clothDimensions:785 x 808 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:F. Hindmarch Air Headquarters, ‘Iraq Command, Hinaidi. 8-11-33.Distinctive Features:Sketch map compiled from mosaic photographs enclosed to letter no. D.O.S. 11080 dated 8th November 1933.Labelled ‘MAP No. 2’ and classified ‘Most Secret’. Shows present and proposed sites of landing ground at Muharraq.Inscriptions:On recto at the top left-hand corner, in red ink: ‘MOST SECRET’.
